ing: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle sparkling red grape juice
2 tablespoons lemon juice, or more to taste
des: "I've made this recipe twice for separate Halloween parties, and guests couldn't get enough! A delicious apple cider punch that is sure to be a hit at any autumn party."
ins: Stir apple cider, sparkling grape juice or wine (see Cook's Note), orange juice, and lemon juice together and refrigerate until serving.
